description:
LEGAL AIRBNB RENTAL!! Two family house. We are conveniently located 7 mins from JFK airport.   All major trains and bus stations are within walking distance. Resort World Casino, US Open, airports, and other major attractions are near by. Its a 20 minute train ride to the heart of Manhattan! My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families. This studio apartment has 1 sofa bed and 1 queen bed. There is no kitchen.

large spacious studio apartment with large balcony.

guest will access to the entire apartment and balcony.

Nice neighborhood near JFK airport. There is so many bars, lounges , restaurants, clubs nearby. The world resort casino is 5 mins away. Lagaurdia airport is only 15 mins away. This location is perfect because its near all.

You are walking distance to all major public transportation. Manhattan city is 20 min train ride !!!
name: Beautiful Studio apartment near JFk
review: Great place! Very comfy! Host was communicable and personable!
